resources.string: Allows users to change their phone\'s voltage table on the fly.

This application manages various hardware parameters of your phone's voltage controller. While there are various benefits to voltage manipulation, careless use can as well result in damaged hardware. It is up to you to decide how much you want to deter from the original values, however, be advised that neither the creator of this app, nor the creator of the module are responsible for damage caused by the misuse of this app. If you need any help with voltage manipulation, feel free to read the tutorial by pressing MENU and then selecting "Tutorial". 

 Created by Petar Å egina
 Built on the undervolting module by Iscaela@xda-developers
